#include <iostream>
 
using namespace std;
 
int main() {
        int t, n[20], i, j, k;
        int dp[1001];
        dp[0] = 1;
        dp[1] = 1;
        dp[2] = 1;
        dp[3] = 2;
        dp[4] = 5;
        for (i = 5; i <= 1000; i++) {
                dp[i] = 0;
                for (j = 0; j < i; j++) {
                        dp[i] += (dp[j] * dp[i - j]);
                        if (dp[i] > 10000)
                                dp[i] %= 10000;
                }
        }
        scanf("%d", &t);
        while (t--) {
                scanf("%d", &n[k++]);
        }
        for (i = 0; i < k; i++)
                printf("%d\n", dp[n[i]]);
        return 0;
}
